Class BaseResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sun.speech.engine.recognition.BaseResult
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpeechEventDispatcher, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, FinalDictationResult, FinalResult, FinalRuleResult, Result

extends java.lang.Object
implements Result, FinalResult, FinalRuleResult, FinalDictationResult, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, SpeechEventDispatcher

      • postAudioReleased

        public void postAudioReleased()
        Utility function to generate AUDIO_RELEASED event and post it to the event queue. Eventually fireAudioReleased will be called by dispatchSpeechEvent as a result of this action.

      • fireAudioReleased

        public void fireAudioReleased(ResultEvent event)
